data.text: @becsouthmore Why vaccinating young people is irresponsable. Numbers from the Netherlands GB and Israel combined show the risk of vaccination is higher than that of COVID for young adults and children https://t.co/uGnfW9ESOp https://t.co/U6e78CSGOi
@becsouthmore I really don’t see why so grateful. The risk from Covid now so low (2 healthy people under 40 have died of it in 7 weeks) that more risk from the AZ vax.
